avastAppDesc.message: Finn de beste prisene, tilbudene og kupongene mens du handler på nettet, med utvidelsen for prissammenligning og kuponger fra Avast.

safePriceContinueShopping.description: It is showed to the user on the rating screen to offer the chance of continue purchasing

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.message: Liker du å bruke AVG SafePrice?

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.message: Liker du å bruke Avast SafePrice?

safePriceLeaveRating.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceLeaveRating.message: Gi oss en vurdering for å vise hvor godt du liker oss.

safeShopBestOfferSaving.description: %s will be the saving percentage of the best offer. Ex: SAVE 25%

safeShopPopularHotelIn.description: %s is the price + currency. Example: Popular hotels from 200,00 €

safeShopSimilarHotel.description: %s is the amount of hotels found. Example: 4 similar hotels

sasGladYouLike.message: Så fint at du liker det!

sasHintBestOfferDesc.message: Gå direkte til den beste prisen for dette produktet.

sasOptionsDisableAll.message: Deaktiver SafePrice på alle nettsteder i 24 timer

sasOptionsEnableAll.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for all domains

sasOptionsEnableOnSite.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for one domain. %s: name of the domain

sasPromoAction.message: Høres bra ut. Lukk denne meldingen.

sasPromoDescription_AVG.message: AVG SafePrice finner de beste tilbudene på ting du ser etter ved å sammenligne prisene på Internett automatisk.

sasPromoDescription_Avast.message: Avast SafePrice finner de beste tilbudene på ting du ser etter ved å sammenligne prisene på Internett automatisk.

sasRecommendedOfferTitle.message: Denne pålitelige forhandleren har gode priser, positive omtaler og god service.

sasSPTooltipText.message: Du vil få se de beste tilbudene når du søker i favorittbutikkene dine på nettet.

sasStartingPrice.description: %s is the minimum value off the price. Example: Starting at: $124.00

sasWhatToDo.message: Hva kan vi gjøre for å forbedre oss?
